question: Who is appointed as the new chairman of South Asian Federation of Exchanges (SAFE)?
explanation: Ashishkumar Chauhan, the current managing director and chief executive officer of the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) is appointed as the new chairman of South Asian Federation of Exchanges (SAFE). SAFE is a forum of 28 member entities from the SAARC Region Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Maldives, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka.
